body:
I haven't figured out how to fix the problem, but I've figured out how to reproduce it without Docker outside of CI. Unfortunately turning on `NODE_ENV=production` removes some of the helpful debugging from the tests, so it is hard to figure out what's going on.

With the changes I just pushed I get this sort of output locally, which is a lot easier to work with:

```
Firefox 52.0.0 (Linux 0.0.0): Executed 82 of 82 (1 FAILED) (1.479 secs / 1.414 secs)
TOTAL: 1 FAILED, 81 SUCCESS


1) should change the action in state & update the form
     <RecipeForm> changeAction
     Expected undefined to be defined.
@webpack:///client/control/tests/components/test_RecipeForm.js:43:6 <- client/control/tests/index.js:68:5934
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:35:23
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11

patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11
     TypeError: n is undefined in client/control/tests/index.js (line 68)
@webpack:///client/control/tests/components/test_RecipeForm.js:44:6 <- client/control/tests/index.js:68:5958
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:35:23
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11
     TypeError: n is undefined in client/control/tests/index.js (line 68)
@webpack:///client/control/tests/components/test_RecipeForm.js:48:6 <- client/control/tests/index.js:68:6075
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:35:23
patchFunction/obj[slot]/arguments[fnArgIndex]@node_modules/jasmine-promises/dist/jasmine-promises.js:47:11

```

I haven't figured out how to fix the problem, but I've figured out how to reproduce it without Docker outside of CI. Unfortunately turning on NODE_ENV=production removes some of the helpful debugging from the tests, so it is hard to figure out what's going on.
